name: Ogazuhl
description:
Ogazuhl is a survival/dugeon-defense game where you play a guardian of a dungeon who defends four chests against goblin invasions.

You need to defend the chests for 5 minutes to win. If any of the chests is robbed empty or your health goes below 0 -- you loose.

Combat is in 2D and is turn-based, while dungeon exploration is in 3D grid-based.
